short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this Pronto extension to share your screen in the Pronto Communications web client found at https://trypronto.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow users to share their screen in Pronto during live streaming.  A user may choose to broadcast either live video or share their screen.  This extension specifically handles the functionality behind prompting a user for which screen they'd like to share.
